title: (x) Michelangelo and the Pope's Ceiling - Hoefler Titling {Mark S}
content: When you don't have a scanner handy, there's always [the internet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052232/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/0802713955.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg). Anyway, the typeface is from the [Hoefler Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052232/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertitling/index.html) family.
author: Mark Simonson
